articles.title: American soldier Travis King, who crossed into North Korea, is in US custody - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Travis King, who had served in South Korea, sprinted into North Korea while on a civilian tour of a border village on July 18. | World News
articles.content: US soldier Travis King who crossed into North Korea two months ago is in American custody, two US officials said as per news agency Associated Press. One unnamed official said that Travis King was tr… [+1615 chars]

articles.title: Only about 1 in 4 American adults definitely wants the updated Covid-19 vaccine, new survey finds - CNN
articles.description: When it comes to getting the updated Covid-19 vaccines this year, only about 1 in 4 American adults say they definitely plan to get the shot, according to new survey findings from the nonprofit health policy group KFF. Roughly another quarter of adults say th…
